### atLowerAddress() {#a283da28f49cf79afe0661c5b84db7910}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename LoadOrStoreT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>static bool llvm::sandboxir::Utils::atLowerAddress (LoadOrStoreT &#42; I0, LoadOrStoreT &#42; I1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp; SE)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
\\Returns true if <code>I0</code> accesses a memory location lower than <code>I1</code>.

Returns false if the difference cannot be determined, if the memory locations are equal, or if I1 accesses a memory location greater than I0.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/utils-h/#l00113">113</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/utils-h">Utils.h</a>.

### getExpectedType() {#a94ed4ff75262c5c7bf6107a1cb09d583}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Type &#42; llvm::sandboxir::Utils::getExpectedType (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a> &#42; V)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
\\Returns the expected type of <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a></code> V.

For most Values this is equivalent to getType, but for stores returns the stored type, rather than void, and for ReturnInsts returns the returned type.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/utils-h/#l00032">32</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/sandboxir/utils-h">Utils.h</a>.

### getExpectedValue() {#af0ce107d4b6f96c84c7fe574a320993f}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
\\Returns the expected <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a> for this instruction.

For most instructions, this is the instruction itself, but for stores returns the stored operand, and for ReturnInstructions returns the returned value.
